replies.body: what happens to all the logitech stuff once someone gets shortlisted? do we have to pick it up somewhere or will you send it some other way?
It will be sent to you
I'm an art virgin what can i do? :(
We all start somewhere :) Here's an opportunity to see what you can come up with.
will ms paint win me the grand pr1ze?
If you make the shortlist, it will be up to the community to decide if your ms paint creation is a top 10 winner :)
does it have to be situated in Luna Park rides specifically? or any type of theme park? and do the champions have to be having fun (e.g can i have a sad amumu)?
As long as it's clear that the champion/s are at a theme park :) Yes you can have a sad Amumu.
can i submit  more then one?
Yes you can!
My parents won't let me go to Sydney alone, nor will they accompany we should I win. What happens to my ticket in this case?
Do we also get the show bags when we win the OPL Grand final tickets from this contest?
Yes, the ticket comes with a showbag.
{{champion:112}} ry will be mine
I will be the {{champion:112}}
Is there anything that MUST be included in the picture apart from champions having a good time. May we include champions with skins? Can we add things that aren't in Luna Park?
As long as it's clear that the champions are at a theme park and the artwork follows the other contest rules. Yes, you can add things that aren't in Luna Park.
Can we include the Luna Park entrance in our picture?
Yes! Be sure to include one or more league champions in it :)
In the rules, which state logos, product names, etc. The entrance has "Luna Park" at the top, is that ok/an exception?
Yes that is ok.
Wait are we allowed to make some sort of skin for the champion or just the champion in a theme park background
As long as the champion is recognisable as a League champion, a skin design is ok. But the champion/s must be depicted at a theme park (it doesn't have to Sydney's Luna Park).
you mean a Luna Park in St Kilda in melbourne?
The artwork can depict any theme park or elements of a theme park e.g. rides, side shows etc.
Models (dioramas) or just, painted/drawn art?

Your own original piece of art — drawn, painted, digital, or in any other two-dimensional format — that depicts one or more champions in the midst of having a battle or fun at a theme park (doesn't have to be Luna Park).
i wanna enter and win the prize :D
Do it, it's free to enter :) You've got until 19th July.
So no rito logo?
No Riot logo. We like to see the artwork be the star :)

Can it be a side show game? Like those clowns that you put ping pong balls into, or that knock'em game where you throw balls at cans?

I just want to check in case that's too "carnival-like" instead of theme park.
How many entires max?
There is no max.
Does it have 2 be hand drawn or can we do it on our pc?

As long as it's your own original piece of art — drawn, painted, digital, or in any other two-dimensional format — that depicts one or more champions in the midst of having a battle or fun at a theme park (doesn't have to be Luna Park).
Is a cos we make and then show off at a theme park cool? Like a cos we make specifically for the contest?
I'm not sure I completely understand your question PhantomCat. Could you please elaborate?
So we can use computer programs for this? And when you say no logos do you mean no Luna Park entrance too?
I already asked that question. You CAN include the entrance.
Thanks for helping me out! :)

Can we do a fist bump? But not in the style of Riot? Can it be digital or just hand drawn?
Thanks :)
Also is there a better chance of winning if we add colour? sorry for so many questions

I have no idea of knowing. The easiest way to answer that would be... if everyone did a black and white entry and you were the only one that did a colour entry, would your colour entry have more chance of winning? Possibly, it would definitely stand out from the other entries in this scenario.
Can I just say that judging by the artwork shown above I have no chance{{item:3070}} {{champion:32}}
Can the artwork be a collage of photos of the champs having fun in the theme park?
Can it be photography? Like photos taken by myself and then digitally put in the characters?

"Your entry must be made by you, submitted by you, and made for this contest: this is about YOU showing YOUR artistic talents specifically for this contest" 

does this allow for taking other peoples photo's (obviously only legally reusable ones) and putting them together in photoshop?
how to send arts to lol cause i made a drawing of yasuo and my friends said to send is to the league {{champion:157}}  can you guyz plz help me with this thx
